ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Securely manage and monitor access to servers and databases without requiring client-side software.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Smart SSH, HTTPS, MySQL and PostgreSQL bastion host â€¢ No client-side software required â€¢ Session recording and replay via web UI â€¢ Direct connection forwarding (not a jump host) â€¢ Native 2FA and SSO support (TOTP & OpenID Connect)
ðŸ“– Summary: Warpgate is a bastion host solution written in Rust that provides secure access to SSH, HTTPS, MySQL, and PostgreSQL servers. It features session recording, 2FA/SSO support, and a web UI for management, all within a single binary and without the need for client-side software.
